00133     double GetDistanceFromRobotToGoal(void) const
00134     {
00135         return
00136             sqrt((m_robotCenterX - m_goalCenterX) * (m_robotCenterX - m_goalCenterX) +
00137                  (m_robotCenterY - m_goalCenterY) * (m_robotCenterY - m_goalCenterY));  
00138     }
00139 
00143     bool HasRobotReachedGoal(void) const
00144     {
00145         return
00146             GetDistanceFromRobotToGoal() <= m_goalRadius;
00147     }
